goals.active: Rescue the spirit of the Wolf Havroun apprentice from the Mists.
goals.complete: Eir and I recruited another powerful havroun and went back into the Mists for Valda. We found her battling the Sons of Svanir and helped her defeat them. Valda explained that she and her master Solvi had been attacked while they were out of body, trapping her spirit in the Mists. Now she's desperate to find Solvi in this world, and we're going to help her.
